message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for your product. This aligns more closely with my budget. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. While I appreciate your interest, $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about $11,500?  This still leaves some room for both of us to be satisfied.

I understand Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. My counteroffer remains at $10,000. This is the maximum I am willing to pay for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
